title: 36 - Live from LA Podcast Festival
description: This week, it's the first ever live My Favorite Murder broadcast from the LA Podcast Festival. Karen, Georgia and comedian/The Dollop co-host Dave Anthony talk about the Trailside Killer, the Wineville Chicken Coop Murders and Australian murderer Mark Erinn Rust.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
